thread.section_title: Omega Rental Cars Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Omega Rental Cars | omegarentalcars.com
thread.title: Peter Forrest
thread.title_full: Omega Rental Cars reviewed by Peter Forrest

author: Peter Forrest
title: Peter Forrest
text: I have used Omega for a lot of years now on my visits to NZ. Always get Subarus' when going skiing and generally their "specials" when visiting family. I have never had an issue with any of the cars ever and the staff are always extremely friendly and helpful.
